name: A CENTER FOR CULTURAL, EDUCATIONAL & SOCIAL SUFFERERS (ACCESS)

address: Flat No- H202, 2nd Floor, Tower- H, SMONDO- 3, NEOTOWN,

briefDescription: â€œA CENTRE FOR CULTURAL, EDUCATIONAL & SOCIAL SUFFERERS"(ACCESS) NGO has been established under the supervision and guidance of renounced psychologist and educationist Dr. Arvind Kumar, with the objective to provide education, cultural upliftment to the masses in general of various section of society without any discrimination towards gender, race, religion, cast, community in general and focus towards the disadvantage groups of our society in particular. Also to work towards the most burning issues within the society like but not limited to Adult education, Awareness on Digital India, Women Empowerment, Legal Awareness among women suffering from injustice, Trafficking and abuse of Girl Child & Women, Multi-disabilities: Mental & Physical.

address: Care of Mr. Yatindra Mohan Shandilya,
